channel.title: Apocalypse PvP
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2jf5z9.jpg[/img] Includes a Webclient and a Downloable Client
Owners
[ul][*]Cody - Visions [*]Rj - Apocalypse[/ul]
Administrators
[ul][*]Kolter - Mike Jones[/ul]
Moderators
[ul][*]Cameron31320 [*]Falor[/ul]
______________________________
What this Server has to offer!
[ul][*]24/7 VPS! *NEW* [*]DFS now works in combat! [*]Economy Server! [*]Kill row system for extra points! [*]New Minigames! Coded 100%! Did NOT come with server base! [*]KBD and KQ Heads in home bank to tele to them! Good items dropped! [*]New Home at Edgeville! [*]Same old classic Cammy-PvP, Recoded COMPLETELY! [*]Added High-Scores system based on pvp points [*]New custom edgeville bank [*]Added Pest Control with interface and all [*]Hopefully full lunar soon to come [*]Fully working Items on Death Interface [*]Fully working High-Scores button with interface attached [*]Fully working Equipment stats button with interface [*]Automatic bank updating for 0 free spots in bank [*]All godswords have proper emotes, gfx, and special attacks [*]New dclaws emote with 4x hits [*]Piety, Chivalry, and All headicons added [*]Master and Pure commands [*]Low level training area for those who like to train [*]Full anti-syi/null [*]Perfect Anti-dupe on trading [*]Thieving stalls added for easy money [*]474 emotes for many weapons [*]AND MUCH MUCH MORE![/ul]
Downloadable Client Shows:
[ul][*]474 Models [*]Correct Gs Gfx [*]Void armour [*]D Claw Spec [*]Whip Model [*]Veng with [B]Skull[/B]! [*]AND MORE UPDATES DAILY![/ul]
Webclient Shows:
[ul][*]Void Armour [*]Gs are in one hand over shoulder [*]Veng with Goo splatering [*]Old DClaws Spec[/ul]
[IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source8.jpg[/img]
Goals: Make Pest control 100% full with npcs and all Add MOST of skills to train Add better interfaces for my high-scores (Should be done tomorrow) Add a pest control npc that gives exp next to the items rewards (with good interface) Replace commands with buttons in quest interface Fix up many other bugs within the server

[CENTER]
Includes a Webclient and a Downloable Client

What this Server has to offer!

[ul][]24/7 VPS! NEW
[]DFS now works in combat!
[]Economy Server!
[]Kill row system for extra points!
[]New Minigames! Coded 100%! Did NOT come with server base!
[]KBD and KQ Heads in home bank to tele to them! Good items dropped!

[]New custom edgeville bank

[]Automatic bank updating for 0 free spots in bank
[]All godswords have proper emotes, gfx, and special attacks
[]New dclaws emote with 4x hits
[]Piety, Chivalry, and All headicons added
[]Master and Pure commands
[]Low level training area for those who like to train

[]Perfect Anti-dupe on trading

Add MOST of skills to train

Fix up many other bugs within the server
